description: Onboarding for online fashion store – Winter Sale flow 1
customer_experience: Customers receive a welcome SMS and then weekly updates.

description: Onboarding for grocery delivery app – Loyalty Program flow 2
call_to_action: Tap the link to track your order
customer_experience: Users get transactional alerts only when they perform actions.
how_to_opt_out: Text STOP to 12345 at any time.

description: Onboarding for fitness studio – Delivery Alerts flow 3
call_to_action: Show this SMS in store to redeem
customer_experience: Subscribers receive up to 3 promo messages per month.
how_to_opt_out: Use the link in the SMS footer to manage preferences.

description: Onboarding for dental clinic – Appointment Reminders flow 4
